name: Black & White Drift Racer
description:
Listen to the Soundtrack

Use your skills as a drift racer to complete the fastest time on the track! You have a limited time to complete each lap before the track manager will get mad and end your run! Each consecutive lap completed will increase your overall speed and decrease the amount of time you have to keep racing! There are two cars you can select from in the main menu (easy and hard).

*Tip: Hold the space bar to drift and try turning without the gas on! You can also turn sharper when you are moving slower.

Objective:
  • Complete as many laps as possible before getting kicked off the track

*You can adjust the music and sound effect volume in the settings menu.

Other notes:

You can go back to the main menu or pause to see your high scores.

The harder car will go faster, but you will have less time to complete each lap!

Good luck and get to burnin that rubber!

All assets are original. This game was made for Black & White Jam #8 "Loop" in one week using Unity, Aseprite and Ableton.
